text:
Treatment for testicular cancer can cause infertility.
	                    Certain treatments for testicular cancer can cause infertility that may be permanent. Patients who may wish to have children should consider sperm banking before having treatment. Sperm banking is the process of freezing sperm and storing it for later use.",CancerGov,Testicular Cancer
What are the stages of Testicular Cancer ?,"Key Points
